test-case.name: copynamespace-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of a prolog with more than one copy-namespace declaration.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces preserve, no-inherit; declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, no-inherit; declare variable $input-context1 external; "aaa"

test-case.name: copynamespace-2
test-case.description: Evaluates that default namespace is overriden by local namespace.

test-case.name: copynamespace-3
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve no-inherit".

test-case.name: copynamespace-4
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit".

test-case.name: copynamespace-5
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve no-inherit" . The copies element use the same prefix.

test-case.name: copynamespace-6
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . The copies element use the same prefix.

test-case.name: copynamespace-7
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "no-preserve no-inherit" . Use global variables and namespaces with prefixes.

test-case.name: copynamespace-8
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve no-inherit" . Use global variables and namespaces with prefixes.

test-case.name: copynamespace-9
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "no-preserve inherit" . Use global variables and namespaces with prefixes.

test-case.name: copynamespace-10
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . Use global variables and namespaces with prefixes.

test-case.name: copynamespace-11
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . Use global variables and namespaces with prefixes. Same prefix different namespace URI.

test-case.name: copynamespace-12
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . Use global variables and namespaces with prefixes. diferent prefix same namespace URI.

test-case.name: copynamespace-13
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . Use global variables. only the XML prefix is used.

test-case.name: copynamespace-14
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . Use global variables where prefix differes in case.

test-case.name: copynamespace-15
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines last element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-16
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "no-preserve inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines last element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-17
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "no-preserve no-inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines last element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-18
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve no-inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines last element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-19
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines mid element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-20
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "no-preserve inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines mid element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-21
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "no-preserve no-inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines mid element in subtree.

test-case.name: copynamespace-22
test-case.description: Evaluates copy namespace declaration with value set to "preserve no-inherit" . with multiple inclusions. Examines mid element in subtree.

test-case.name: K-CopyNamespacesProlog-1
test-case.description: A prolog may not contain two copy-namespaces declarations.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces preserve, no-inherit; declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, no-inherit; 1 eq 1

test-case.name: K-CopyNamespacesProlog-2
test-case.description: A 'declare copy-namespaces' declaration specifying no-preserve and no-inherit.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, no-inherit; 1 eq 1

test-case.name: K-CopyNamespacesProlog-3
test-case.description: A 'declare copy-namespaces' declaration specifying no-preserve and no-inherit.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces preserve, inherit; 1 eq 1

test-case.name: K-CopyNamespacesProlog-4
test-case.description: A 'declare copy-namespaces' declaration specifying no-preserve and no-inherit in a wrong order .
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-inherit, no-preserve; 1 eq 1

test-case.name: K-CopyNamespacesProlog-5
test-case.description: A 'declare copy-namespaces' declaration specifying preserve and inherit in a wrong order .
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces inherit, preserve; 1 eq 1

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-1
test-case.description: Use no-preserve, inherit with the default namespace.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, inherit; {}

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-2
test-case.description: Ensure the 'copy-namespaces' keyword is parsed correctly.
test-case.test: copy-namespaces lt copy-namespaces

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-3
test-case.description: Ensure the 'namespace' keyword is parsed correctly.
test-case.test: namespace lt namespace

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-4
test-case.description: Verify that the default element namespace is not touched when using no-inherit.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces preserve, no-inherit; <e xmlns="http://example.com/"> { <b/> } </e>

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-5
test-case.description: Have a namespace which is used further down.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, no-inherit; { }

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-6
test-case.description: Check in-scope bindings of constructed nodes.
test-case.test: declare namespace ns = "http://example.com/"; { } /(for $n in (., b, b/ns:c), $i in in-scope-prefixes($n) order by $i return ($i, '|'))

result.assert-string-value: appearsUnused | appearsUnused | appearsUnused | xml | xml | xml |

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-7
test-case.description: Have an unused prefix further down the hierarchy.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve, no-inherit; { }

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-8
test-case.description: Copy an element with no children.
test-case.test: declare copy-namespaces no-preserve,inherit; { {()} }

test-case.name: K2-CopyNamespacesProlog-9
test-case.description: Use direct element constructors inside enclosed expressions.

result.assert-string-value: namespace1 xml | namespace1 namespace2 namespace3 xml
